subsection.name: Bean Console
subsection.p: The bean console is simple web application for Danube web application server that allows access to all beans defined in the root application context. It allows bean properties to be displayed using available property editors, read-write properties to be altered and public method to be called.

The bean console is installed on "/bean-console" context path of local web server running on port 8080 ("http://localhost:8080/bean-console"). It is implemented using Danube and FreeMarker. Source code is supplied.
